channel.title: 667 - Add a teleportTo command

item.title: 667 - Add a teleportTo command
item.dc:creator: @ni562 ni562
item.description:
@ni562 wrote:

I added this command for the purposes of debugging and testing.

it should be added to the commands.java file.

[code] if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“goto”)) {

	          String coordsx = cmd[1]; // Command Coded by FoShizlle for debugging
	          String coordsy = cmd[2]; // Format should be ::goto xCorrdinates yCoordinates zCoordinates 
	          String coordsz = cmd[3]; // (ex: goto 3243 3214 0)
                      int x = Integer.parseInt(coordsx);
	          int y = Integer.parseInt(coordsy);
	          int z = Integer.parseInt(coordsz);


	              
	          Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(x, y, z));
	      }[/code]

I figured maybe someone else could get some use out of this, hope it helps!!

ni562

Read full topic
